Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Southbound Reroute near Austin/Garfield
ShortDescription: SB 91 Austin buses temp. rerouted via Austin, Garfield Street, Lombard, Fillmore, Harvey, Roosevelt, and Austin: due to, construction near Austin/Garfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Garfield Street, Lombard, Fillmore, Harvey, Roosevelt, and Austin, due to street blockage near Austin/Garfield.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Western (O'Hare Branch)
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Western (O'Hare Branch) due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Western (O'Hare Branch) due to a sick customer.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
